title: Riot Games turned Akali into a minion... congrats
body:
With the most recent update you made one of the coolest champions in the game which I loved literally unplayable. If you really wanted to nerf Akali but keep her viable, this is far from being the correct way.

I suggest now, reverse these nerfs. She was already weak and even needed a few buffs. But if you want to nerf her, here is what I suggest.

Keep that W update, it's fine.

Passive damage: 30/45/60/75 (levels 1/6/11/16) + 10% total AD + 15% AP

Q cost: 100/90/80/70/60
Q damage: 70/85/100/115/130 + 60% AP (no more AD)

E cost: 50/45/40/35/30
E damage: 40/60/80/100/120 + 30% total AD + 20% AP
E cooldown: 30/28/26/24/22 sec

R dash 1 damage: 50/100/150 + 30% total AD
R dash 2 damage:

* Lowest: 40/80/120 + 20% AP
* Highest: 200/400/600 + 100% AP

People did learn to play her. She wasn't weak before the nerfs. She needed to be nerfed, she was too strong in high elo and pro play because people knew how to play her.

Yes but now she's beyond weak. Either lower her Q's energy cost or bring back her R dash. Sure, damage nerfs are fine. I can live with 40 damage less on R. That's not a big BS. But things like this R are. Akali is meant to be hard. Also 120 energy rank 1 for real on Q? That's straight up making her useless, considering how slowly energy regens. Compare her to Riven. Riven has 0 costs, so does Yasuo. Until she gets enough energy in time, they can smack her when she's out of W.

Akali needed a buff, not a nerf. She's the hardest champion in the game after Azir and probably Syndra. Yasuo is still slightly easier, but he's in the top 5 too.

In case you didn't see the energy changes they initially made for PBE, it was 140 at rank 1 down to 100 at rank 5.

Sure, she now has too much energy to spare because Presence of Mind, but if she's the only one using that, why not remove energy generation from the rune, and done, no need to increase her costs.

Oh wait, I forgot, bad players rely too much on that extra energy, if we remove it and make them have to actually manage her costs, they will feed even more than before, so can't do that, need to make her easy to play.
I am fine if they remove energy gen on that rune. I don't use it anyways. But if they don't revert her Q energy to at least halfway 110 to 90, I will be forced to use it.
